#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long INT;

int main(void)
{
	INT LN[10000], temp, sum, temp2;

	for (int x = 1; x <= 8000; x++)
	{
		sum = 0;
		temp = 5;
		temp2=x;
		while (temp2 != 0)
		{
			if (temp2 & 1)
			{
				sum += temp;
			}

			temp *= 5;

			temp2/= 2;
		}
		LN[x] = sum;
	}
	
	int T;
	INT N;
	
	scanf("%d",&T);
	
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%llu",&N);
		
		printf("%llu\n",LN[N]);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
